content: A. Karpov vs. B. Spassky, Candidates Tournament semifinal, Leningrad, 1974. Anyone who knows this game knows how much beauty there can be in the game of chess.
translations: ita:A. Karpov vs. B. Spassky, Semifinale del Torneo dei Candidati, Leningrado, 1974. Chiunque conosca questo gioco sa quanta
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
